heading: Path of the Blind Dungeon Guide
content: Path of the Blind is a fast dungeon for groups due to the Bloodstone objective at the end of the dungeon, which you can split to quickly summon the boss. is available for Necromancers on first completion. Overall it should not present too difficult a challenge, and the elite packs here can offers excellent XP. While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! Reviewed by
